verses.text_plain: Lord, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.
verses.verse_html: 1Lord, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.

verses.text_plain: Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 2Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.

verses.text_plain: But thou, O Lord, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.
verses.verse_html:
3But thou, O Lord, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head. ▼
▼ for: or, about

verses.text_plain: I cried unto the Lord with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 4I cried unto the Lord with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.

verses.text_plain: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the Lord sustained me.
verses.verse_html: 5I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the Lord sustained me.

verses.text_plain: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.
verses.verse_html: 6I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.

verses.text_plain: Arise, O Lord; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.
verses.verse_html: 7Arise, O Lord; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.

verses.text_plain: Salvation belongeth unto the Lord: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 8Salvation belongeth unto the Lord: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.
